task.title: How to Use the Electronic Projector
task.shortdesc: Both classrooms have an electronic projector-- a Samsung UF-S80T-- if you have papers you want to show to the room, or any physical object.

ol.li: Turn on the lamp by pressing the button labeled 'LAMP'
On the teacher station, search for 'uf-s80t' in the Finder
For fullscreen, click on the black icon with the white F in the upper-left hand corner
